name: Lakshmi Tool Makers
description: manufacturer and supplier of Press Tools
overview:
Established in the year 2007 at Chennai, LAKSHMI TOOL MAKERS has carved a distinct niche in the industry by manufacturing and supplying a wide spectrum of Press Tools, Press Components, Die Sets, Jigs & Fixtures, Machine Tools, Machined Components, Hardware Fittings and MS Iron Scraps. We have set high standards in the industry and have successfully raised the bars of customer satisfaction by offering a range of quality driven products. Being a quality-focused company, we follow stringent quality parameters in the manufacturing process adhering to international quality standards.

Our Products: Jigs & Fixtures Machined Components Hardware Fittings Brackets

Infrastructure: We have empowered ourselves with advanced tools and latest technology, supporting us to facilitate the production of impeccable quality products. Moreover, we have an in-house quality testing unit that enables the selection of finest quality raw material.

Our Team: Our assiduous and adroit professionals hold industrial expertise and strive extremely hard towards the attainment of complete customer satisfaction. For us, it is the culmination of years of effort to develop an extensive range of products that is at par with the industry standards.

Our Quality: Being a quality-conscious organization, we have adopted stringent quality policies that are meant to be followed by every member of the company. Moreover, our quality controllers diligently supervise all the business operations to ensure the delivery of quality tested products.
